content:
SequentialActivityDesigner Class

Definition

Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.

In this Article

[System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated.  Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
public class SequentialActivityDesigner : System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner
Inheritance

CompositeActivityDesigner

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

The SequentialActivityDesigner and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers. Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the SequentialActivityDesigner.

Constructors

SequentialActivityDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the SequentialActivityDesigner class.

public SequentialActivityDesigner ();

Properties

AccessibilityObject

Gets an AccessibleObject that allows the SequentialActivityDesigner to adjust its UI for users who have disabilities.

public override System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject AccessibilityObject { get; }
Value
AccessibleObject

The AccessibleObject to associate with the designer.

Remarks

If the initial value of the AccessibleObject is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the SequentialActivityDesigner creates an AccessibleObject.

CanExpandCollapse

Gets a value indicating whether the SequentialActivityDesigner can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow designer surface.

public override bool CanExpandCollapse { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the designer can be expanded and collapsed on the workflow design surface; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Remarks

If CanExpandCollapse returns true, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface.

If the parent designer of the SequentialActivityDesigner is ParallelActivityDesigner, CanExpandCollapse returns false. Additionally, if the SequentialActivityDesigner is the root designer, CanExpandCollapse returns false.

Expanded

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer is expanded on the workflow design surface.

public override bool Expanded { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the SequentialActivityDesigner is expanded on the workflow design surface; otherwise, false. The default is true.

FirstSelectableObject

Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the SequentialActivityDesigner.

public override object FirstSelectableObject { get; }
Value
Object

An Object that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.

Glyphs

Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the SequentialActivityDesigner.

protected override System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection Glyphs { get; }
Value
ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection

A DesignerGlyph read-only collection that contains all of the glyphs to display on the SequentialActivityDesigner.

HelpText

Gets or sets the text to display when the SequentialActivityDesigner contains no other activity designers.

protected virtual string HelpText { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface.

Remarks

The HelpText property value is displayed on the SequentialActivityDesigner surface when it contains no child activity designers.

HelpTextRectangle

Gets the rectangle that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText* property.

protected virtual System.Drawing.Rectangle HelpTextRectangle { get; }
Value
Rectangle

A Rectangle that serves as the bounds for the text displayed by the stem.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.HelpText* property.

HelpTextSize

Gets the height and width of the text to display in the SequentialActivityDesigner when it contains no child activity designers.

protected System.Drawing.Size HelpTextSize { get; }
Value
Size

The Size that defines the height and width of the text displayed by SequentialActivityDesigner when it contains no child activity designers. By default HelpTextSize is set to a newly initialized Size.

LastSelectableObject

Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the SequentialActivityDesigner.

public override object LastSelectableObject { get; }
Value
Object

The Object that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.

Methods

GetConnectors()

Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.

protected virtual System.Drawing.Rectangle[] GetConnectors ();
Returns
Rectangle[]

The Rectangle array that bounds the connectors.

Remarks

If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, GetConnectors returns an empty array. If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, GetConnectors returns an array of one rectangle.

GetDropTargets(Point)

Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the SequentialActivityDesigner.

protected override System.Drawing.Rectangle[] GetDropTargets (System.Drawing.Point dropPoint);
dropPoint
Point

The Point that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.

Returns
Rectangle[]

The Rectangle array that represents the valid drop locations within the SequentialActivityDesigner.

GetNextSelectableObject(Object,DesignerNavigationDirection)

Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current SequentialActivityDesigner.

public override object GetNextSelectableObject (object obj, System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection direction);
obj
Object

The current object in the navigation order.

direction
DesignerNavigationDirection

A DesignerNavigationDirection enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.

Returns
Object

The first selectable Object that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order of the SequentialActivityDesigner.

HitTest(Point)

Returns information about the SequentialActivityDesigner at the specified point on the workflow design surface.

public override System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo HitTest (System.Drawing.Point point);
point
Point

The Point location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.

Returns
HitTestInfo

A HitTestInfo that contains information about the SequentialActivityDesigner.

Remarks

The information returned by HitTest is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it. It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.

Initialize(Activity)

Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.

protected override void Initialize (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity activity);
activity
Activity

The Activity with which to initialize the SequentialActivityDesigner.

Remarks

Initialize assigns a value for the HelpText property that is displayed on the SequentialActivityDesigner if it does not contain any child designers.

OnLayoutPosition(ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs)

Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the SequentialActivityDesigner.

protected override void OnLayoutPosition (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs e);
e
ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs

The ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs that contains the layout arguments.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

e contains a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

OnLayoutSize(ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs)

Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the SequentialActivityDesigner.

protected override System.Drawing.Size OnLayoutSize (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs e);
e
ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs

The ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs that contains the layout arguments.

Returns
Size

The Size that contains the new size settings for SequentialActivityDesigner.

OnPaint(ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)

Draws the visual representation of activity at design time.

protected override void OnPaint (System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs e);
e
ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs

The ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs that contains the drawing arguments.
